original_text: Then the Spirit lifted me up and brought me into the inner court, and the glory of the Lord filled the temple.
korean_text: 영이 나를 들어 데리고 안뜰에 들어가시기로 내가 보니 여호와의 영광이 성전에 가득하더라

sentences.original_text: Then the Spirit lifted me up
and brought me into the inner court
and the glory of the Lord filled the temple
